title: My nephew just got back from a one year tour

content: Congratulations to him twice: For having guts enough to go, and for getting back!! Wandering and Wondering
reply: Congratulations to him twice: For having guts enough to go, and for getting back!! Wandering and Wondering
title: My nephew just got back from a one year tour

content: WELCOME HOME TROOP! VETERANS....The Greatest Fraternity!
reply: WELCOME HOME TROOP! VETERANS....The Greatest Fraternity!
title: My nephew just got back from a one year tour

content: That is truly fantatsic - PTL We know now if that debriefing is done right it could prevent serious problems later. If you have contact with him, remember to tell him to take advantage of every minute of time with the medical people and any counseling he can get. It doesn't mean he less of a good man and soldier. It is also a good time him to get buddy names and addresses. You never know when they might come in handy. Again, we all rejoice for your nephew and your family. OAL God and the soldier, All men adore, In time of trouble, And no more; For when war is over, And all things righted, God is neglected - The old soldier slighted. Founding Member Original DVG & Proud Member, Rupterd Duck/Derelict Veterans

content: Welcome home to your nephew, praise God he is safe! I pray he doesn't have to go back! Keep smiling, everyone will wonder what you've been up to!

content: Treat him well and try to imagine what he may have gone through. Kid gloves and understanding are the rule of the day. And give him the thanks of all of us Veterans. We do understand!
